description: The ``opc_compute_security_application`` resource creates and manages a security application in an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Compute Classic identity domain.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Dport.description: The port, or range of ports, to enable for this application, e.g `8080`, `6000-7000`. This must be set if the `protocol` is set to `tcp` or `udp`.

Icmpcode.description:
The ICMP code to enable for this application, if the `protocol` is `icmp`. Must be one of
`admin`, `df`, `host`, `network`, `port` or `protocol`.

Icmptype.description:
The ICMP type to enable for this application, if the `protocol` is `icmp`. Must be one of
`echo`, `reply`, `ttl`, `traceroute`, `unreachable`.

Name.description: The unique (within the identity domain) name of the application.

Protocol.description:
The protocol to enable for this application. Must be one of
`tcp`, `udp`, `ah`, `esp`, `icmp`, `icmpv6`, `igmp`, `ipip`, `gre`, `mplsip`, `ospf`, `pim`, `rdp`, `sctp` or `all`.
